section.name: Page Not Found
section.p: Sorry, the page you requested was not found. This may because:

ul.li: The page has moved, was outdated, or has not been created yet
You following a link from another site that pointed to this page.

section.p: We have recently reorganised our site, so please try looking in the navigation on the left for the item you are looking for on Maven 1.x or the Maven project. For information about Maven 2.0 or Continuum, please visit their sub sites, available from the links in the top right of the page.
There is no need to report this broken link to the Maven team, as errors are periodically monitored and repaired.
